"Urban Recovery":
"This is an emergency.
Darkers are invading the ARKS Ship's
urban sector. All ARKS members are to prep
for combat and engage the enemy.
Defeat the Darkers within the city,
including the large Darker that appears to
be relaying orders. This is not a drill!
――――――――――――――――――――
Failure: Time limit expires,
Be defeated in the final area."
